column6: MAGNUM OPUS PART 1 In this crossover with the Thunderbolts, Deadpool unleashes his most insane plan yet: an assault against Osborn!  But as Deadpool storms his way to the top of Avengers Tower, Osborn deploys the brand new Thunderbolts!
column8: | colorist:Marte Gracia | colorist:Jason Pearson | penciller:Paco Medina | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Juan Vlasco | writer:Daniel Way
